418080.name: Stardust Galaxy Warriors: Stellar Climax - Soundtrack
418080.description:
Enjoy the galactic tunes of the Stardust Galaxy Warriors soundtrack anywhere, anytime, without any pesky aliens or robots trying to blow you up - The cheese is yours!

Technical Info:
  • Format: MP3
  • Running time: 1:00:34
  • Total size: 135 MB
  • Bitrate: 320 kbps
  • Stereo

Composed and produced by Matias Lehtoranta, with the exception of Track #2 by Ville Kaunisto.
418080.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
